name: Extracted Souls
description: Extracted Souls is based around the common act of being indebted to others, as the debtor is slave to the lender. In the game the character is doing collections for the lender in collections of lives removed from other plants and bandits that roam the game map. The character fights throughs the days collecting lives for the lender that arrives at night forcing collection for an amount of lives, if the amount is not sufficed by the collection of the lives the day earlier the lender removes the characters life.
